verses.name: Ezekiel 40:19
verses.text: Then he measured the breadth from the forefront of the lower gate unto the forefront of the inner court without, an hundred cubits eastward and northward.

verses.name: Ezekiel 40:20
verses.text: And the gate of the outward court that looked toward the north, he measured the length thereof, and the breadth thereof.

verses.name: Ezekiel 40:21
verses.text: And the little chambers thereof were three on this side and three on that side; and the posts thereof and the arches thereof were after the measure of the first gate: the length thereof was fifty cubits, and the breadth five and twenty cubits.
